name: You So Slime
description:
A top down retro adventure. You start out as a helpless slime, trapped in a dungeon full of perils. Your maleable nature allows you to grow stronger and gaining new abilities. 

Move - Arrow keys

Melee - X

Ranged - Z

Menu - Spacebar

This version of the game was made for GBJam in 1 week, it features two distinct zones, two boss battles, lots of exploration and combat, chances to unlock new abilities and level up health and damage. More may be added to complete this game in the future, stay tuned for updates. 

Tips:

First boss is on shaky footing

No melee or ranged weapon? Keep exploring 

Tech Notes:

Best played in full screen. 

No audio possibly. Might work in other browsers. hoping to fix later
